markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

An effect with this trait applies one or more diseases. A disease is typically an affliction.
name: Disease
